value.title: Vroom Acquires AI-Enabled Vehicle Information Provider CarStory
value.excerpt: Vroom's announcement that it will purchase AI-enabled info provider CarStory shows how used-car retailers are increasingly relying on data science.

value.title: Fun machine learning experiment creates a vocal opera in your browser
value.excerpt: Google's Arts and Culture lab has launched a clever browser experiment in collaboration with David Li. The Blob Opera puts four operatic voices at your disposal to create glorious AI-driven performances.

value.title: If AI Is Our Future, What Can We Learn From The Past?
value.excerpt: The power of AI to solve large-scale problems perhaps met no greater test than COVID-19. Around the world, medical experts have leveraged AI to drastically reduce the time scale of finding and developing a new vaccine to treat the pandemic.

value.title: IBM Acquires Fintech Startup Expertus To Strengthen Banking Solutions

value.title: Managers that use A.I. 'will replace those that do not,' IBM executive says
value.excerpt: IBM said it would buy Instana, a firm that helps businesses manage data across a variety of cloud applications in different places.

value.title: Advances in facial recognition technology could amplify the persecution of minorities, AI experts warn
value.excerpt: As AI technology rapidly advances, experts say people of colour and other minorities around the world will face further persecution without regulation.

value.title: Mobileye looks to build its own lidar to drive down self-driving costs
value.excerpt: The chief executive of Intel Corp-owned Mobileye on Tuesday laid out plans for a self-driving car system for 2025 that could use house-built lidar sensors rather than units from Luminar Technologies Inc.

value.title: AWS DeepRacer League announces 2020 Championship Cup winner Po-Chun Hsu of Taiwan
value.excerpt: AWS DeepRacer is the fastest way to get rolling with machine learning (ML). It’s a fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning, a 3D racing simulator, and a global racing league.
